column4: Can somebody help me with an pidgin-problem under ubuntu 9.10? It won't start
im running pidgin under ubuntu 9.10 in fact im chatting here using pidgin... how did you install it?
I upgraded from 9.04 to 9.10
and there it updatet pidgin from 2.5x to 2.62
since then, I cannot start pidgin, eL_pSycHo
did you try removing pidgin and installing it again?
sure. Also with apt-get remove --purge
what version of pidgin do you have installed?
pidgin -v
Pidgin 2.6.2 (libpurple 2.5.5)
your problem might be libpurple. i have libpurple 2.6.2 same as pidgin
eL_pSycHo,
yes, as you aks i see...
try installing libpurple 2.6.2
just a second...
That's crazy. If i check with aptitude, i see that libpurple-bin and libpurple0 is installed with version 2.6.2
I found the error
There was /usr/local/lib/libpurple.so.0.5.5 in the system. After removing it, it starts
and pidgin now also starts with libpurple 2.6.2
great :)
Thank you very much.
youre welcome :)
Thanks!
no I can uninstall kopete. I hate this pice of software :) ;)
